fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At the start of each day, you will attempt to remember you were like a Town role that is in the graveyard untl you remember a role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will remember a Town role once one has died.
- This might not be the first Town role listed in the graveyard.
- You can remember roles even if they are hidden.
- You will prioritize Town Power roles
